name: Hotel Altes Fährhaus
description:
Located in Berlin by the river Havel, Hotel Altes Fährhaus offers an beautiful accommodations surrounded by nature. The hotel features a playground, a garden as well as free WiFi and parking.

Guests can enjoy outdoor activities like running, cycling or swimming at the beach located in 0.9 mi distance. Services like bicycle or boat hire are available on request, depending on the season. The property further offers free and secure bicycle parking.

Guest rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms have a kitchenette. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite.

A fresh buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. There is also a bar and a restaurant serving Italian cuisine on site.

Kurfürstendamm and Messe Berlin are 8.7 mi away, while The Brandenburg Gate and The Reichstag are about 11 mi from the property. Tegel Airport is only 6.8 mi away.

name: Hotel AMANO East Side
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hotel AMANO East Side in Berlin offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms, hypoallergenic bedding, and free WiFi. Each room includes a refrigerator, TV, and parquet floors.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can relax on the sun terrace or in the garden, enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar, and take advantage of the 24-hour front desk and housekeeping services. Additional amenities include an electric vehicle charging station, bicycle parking, and luggage storage.

Dining Experience: The hotel serves a buffet breakfast with vegetarian and gluten-free options, including fresh pastries, cheese, fruits, and juice. Pizza is available for lunch and dinner.

 Located 15 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the hotel is a short walk from the East Side Gallery and Alexanderplatz. Nearby attractions include Berlin Cathedral and the Berlin TV Tower.

name: Mercure Hotel MOA Berlin
description:
Offering a unique atrium and free WiFi, this 4-star design hotel lies in the Tiergarten district of Berlin. Birkenstraße Underground Station is 656 feet away.

All rooms at the Mercure Hotel MOA Berlin feature air conditioning, tea/coffee facilities, and a flat-screen TV.

The Mercure Hotel MOA Berlin's large atrium features a light-flooded lobby and garden design. Guests can also relax in the stylish bar or in the Mercure Hotel MOA Berlin's spacious restaurant.

The hotel is located in a historic building which used to be a bread factory. Many international restaurants, cafés, and shops are located nearby.

The Mercure Hotel MOA Berlin is only 2 underground stops from Berlin Zoo and 3 stops from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Berlin - Alexanderplatz by IHG
description:
The Holiday Inn Express - Berlin - Alexanderplatz is located in the Mitte district in Berlin, 1969 feet from the Berlin TV Tower. It offers an on-site bar, a 24-hour reception and free WiFi throughout the property.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a modern design, a kettle and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and USB ports. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Alexanderplatz is 2297 feet from the hotel. The Holiday Inn Express - Berlin - Alexanderplatz is also just a 5-minute walk from the Nikolai historic district and a 10-minute walk from the UNESCO Museum Island.

The Klosterstraße Underground Station is just steps away. Located on the U2 line, it offers direct connections to the Prenzlauer Berg going-out district, Alexanderplatz, Potsdamer Platz, the Berlin Exhibition Grounds and the Olympic Stadium.

Private parking is available on site for a daily fee. In the hotel's underground garage there are 2 charging stations for electric vehicles.

name: Locke at East Side Gallery
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Locke at East Side Gallery in Berlin offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms, tea and coffee makers, and free WiFi. Each room includes a work desk, seating area, and modern amenities.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can enjoy a fitness center, terrace, restaurant, bar, and coffee shop. Additional services include a 24-hour front desk, bike hire, and luggage storage.

Prime Location: Located 15 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the hotel is a 7-minute walk from the East Side Gallery. Nearby attractions include Alexanderplatz (1.6 mi) and Berlin Cathedral (2.4 mi). Guests appreciate the scenic views and well-equipped kitchens.

name: Hotel AMO by AMANO Friedrichstraße
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hotel AMO by AMANO Friedrichstraße in Berlin offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms, free WiFi, and modern amenities. Each room includes a bath, shower, TV, and work desk.

Dining and Leisure: Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast and dinner at the on-site restaurant. The hotel features a terrace, garden, bar, and outdoor seating area. Additional facilities include a paid shuttle service, elevator, 24-hour front desk, concierge, and tour desk.

Prime Location: Located in the city center, the hotel is less than 0.6 mi from the Natural History Museum and close to attractions such as the Memorial of the Berlin Wall and Brandenburg Gate. Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 17 mi away. An ice-skating rink is nearby.

 Highly rated for its public transport options, convenience for city trips, and breakfast provided by the property.

name: Steigenberger Hotel Am Kanzleramt
description:
Central Location: Steigenberger Hotel Am Kanzleramt in Berlin offers a central setting with Berliner Philharmonie and Brandenburg Gate within 0.9 mi. Berlin Central Station is a 3-minute walk away, while Berlin Brandenburg Airport lies 17 mi from the property.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms with walk-in showers, and free WiFi. Additional amenities include terraces with city views, mini-bars, and soundproofing.

Dining Experience: The modern restaurant serves German and international cuisines with vegetarian options. Guests can enjoy breakfast buffet, dinner, and room service.

Facilities: The hotel offers a sauna, fitness center, bar, and free WiFi. Other facilities include a business area, family rooms, and bicycle parking.

Nearby Attractions: Nearby attractions include Reichstag, Holocaust Memorial, and Berlin Central Station. Boating and cycling activities are available in the surroundings.

name: Schwalbenflug 1 Berlin
description:
Spacious Accommodations: Schwalbenflug 1 Berlin offers a spacious apartment in Berlin. The property features three bedrooms and a modern bathroom, ensuring comfort for all guests.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can enjoy a beautiful garden, a family-friendly restaurant serving Italian cuisine, and free WiFi. Additional amenities include a games room, children's playground, and barbecue facilities.

Convenient Location: Located 18 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the apartment is near attractions such as Alexanderplatz Underground Station (6.8 mi) and the Berlin TV Tower (7.5 mi). The quietness of the area is highly appreciated by guests.

name: Hotel Berlin, Berlin, a member of Radisson Individuals
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hotel Berlin in Berlin offers family rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities. Each room includes a work desk, TV, and free WiFi, ensuring a pleasant stay.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can enjoy a sauna, fitness center, restaurant, and bar. The modern restaurant serves German, international, and European cuisines, offering brunch, lunch, and dinner. Additional facilities include a minimarket, bicycle parking, and express check-in and check-out services.

Prime Location: Located in the city center, the hotel is 14 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport. Nearby attractions include Zoologischer Garten underground station (16-minute walk), Berliner Philharmonie (1.1 mi), and Kurfürstendamm (1.6 mi). Boating is available in the surroundings.

name: Motel One Berlin-Bellevue
description:
This Motel One Berlin-Bellevue provides air-conditioned rooms, a 24-hour bar and free Wi-Fi. Bellevue Palace and the Tiergarten Park are a 5-minute walk away.

All of the stylish rooms at the Motel One Berlin-Bellevue include a flat-screen TV and a dark granite bathroom with a rainforest shower.

Featuring large sofas and modern décor, the One Lounge combines a lobby, a bar and a café. International drinks, coffee specialties and a variety of snacks are available here.

The Bellevue S-Bahn (city rail) Station is just 1969 feet from the Motel One Bellevue, providing a link to Berlin’s Main Train Station in just 2 minutes.

Some free parking spaces are available on the street nearby. A certain number of supervised garage parking spaces are available for an additional charge, and these must be reserved directly at the hotel.

name: harry's home Berlin-Moabit hotel & apartments
description:
harry's home Berlin-Moabit hotel & apartments had a total renovation beginning of 2023.Centrally located in Berlin’s Tiergarten-Mitte District, harry's home Berlin-Moabit hotel & apartments is a modern hotel combining international standards with a local flavor. The bright rooms enjoy a view of the shady courtyard.

Accommodations at the harry's home Berlin-Moabit hotel & apartments is provided in spacious guestrooms equipped with extra-long beds. They all include a flat-screen TV featuring cable channels.

A rich buffet breakfast is served daily in the stylish Park Restaurant or on the outdoor terrace.

The hotel stands beside the Turmstraße U-Bahn Station, only 2 stops from the elegant shops of the Kurfürstendamm. Bus TXL for Tegel Airport stops outside the harry's home Berlin-Moabit hotel & apartments and runs to Tegel Airport in 20 minutes.

name: Premier Inn Berlin Alexanderplatz
description:
Prime Location: Premier Inn Berlin Alexanderplatz is located in Berlin city center, offering easy access to key attractions. Alexanderplatz Underground Station is a five-minute walk away, while Alexanderplatz lies 1640 feet nearby. Berlin Cathedral is a 19-minute walk, and Berlin TV Tower is less than 0.6 mi distant.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature private bathrooms with free toiletries, hairdryers, and showers. Each room includes a TV, electric kettle, and complimentary WiFi, ensuring a pleasant stay.

Convenient Facilities: Guests can enjoy a bar and free WiFi, private check-in and check-out services, a elevator, and a 24-hour front desk. Additional amenities include bicycle parking, luggage storage, and a buffet breakfast.

Nearby Attractions: Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 16 mi from the hotel. Other nearby points of interest include the Pergamon Museum and Neues Museum, each 1.1 mi away, and the German Historical Museum at 1.1 mi. An ice-skating rink is also located in the surroundings.

name: Hotel ZOE by AMANO
description:
Central Location: Hotel ZOE by AMANO in Berlin offers a central setting with Berlin Cathedral a 7-minute walk away and Berlin TV Tower less than 0.6 mi distant. The Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 16 mi from the property.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, iPads, and city views. Additional amenities include kitchenettes, soundproofing, and free WiFi.

Dining and Leisure: Guests can enjoy a terrace, bar, and outdoor seating area. The hotel provides a buffet breakfast, child-friendly buffet, and bicycle parking.

Nearby Attractions: Nearby attractions include the Neues Museum and Pergamon Museum within walking distance. An ice-skating rink is also available in the surroundings.

name: Me and All Hotel Berlin East Side, by Hyatt - NEW OPENING
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, river views, and modern amenities such as free WiFi, mini-bars, and soundproofing.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can enjoy a sauna, fitness center, restaurant, bar, and yoga classes. Additional services include a 24-hour front desk, concierge, and electric vehicle charging station.

Dining Experience: The modern restaurant serves dinner with continental and buffet breakfast options, including vegetarian and gluten-free menus. Live music and a coffee shop enhance the dining experience.

Prime Location: Located in Berlin city center, the hotel is 14 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport and near attractions like the East Side Gallery (16-minute walk) and Alexanderplatz (1.2 mi).
address: An der Schillingbrucke 2, Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg, 10243 Berlin, Germany

name: Hotel the YARD Berlin
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hotel the YARD Berlin in Berlin offers family rooms with garden views, air-conditioning, and private bathrooms. Each room includes a work desk, soundproofing, and free WiFi.

Dining and Leisure: Guests can enjoy a modern restaurant serving local cuisine and vegetarian options. The hotel features a sun terrace, garden, bar, and outdoor seating area. Additional amenities include a steam room, minimarket, and outdoor play area.

Prime Location: Located 14 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the hotel is near attractions such as Topography of Terror (1.1 mi) and Checkpoint Charlie (17-minute walk). Boating is available in the surrounding area. Guests appreciate the attentive staff and comfortable rooms.

name: MEININGER Hotel Berlin Tiergarten
description:
Located in Berlin, in the new Schultheiss-Quartier in Moabit (Shopping Mall) and next to Tiergarten park, 1.5 mi from Natural History Museum, MEININGER Hotel Berlin Tiergarten offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk for guests. It is located 1.6 mi from Brandenburg Gate and 1.7 mi away from Potsdamer Platz.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at MEININGER Hotel Berlin Tiergarten also have free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a city view. Guest rooms include a desk.

Guests at the accommodations can enjoy a continental breakfast. The parking is available in the nearby Schultheiss-Quartier.

Theater and Comedy at Kurfuerstendamm is 1.9 mi from MEININGER Hotel Berlin Tiergarten, while Kurfürstendamm is 1.9 mi away. Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 19 mi from the property.

name: martas Hotel Berlin-Mitte
description:
This boutique hotel is a beautiful historic building located in a quiet street right in the heart of Berlin’s Mitte district, close to many galleries, restaurants and tourist attractions.

Dating back to the 19th century when it was used as a Christian refuge and hotel, the martas Hotel provides historic charm. Look forward to the bright and comfortable rooms with warm and friendly colors as well as traditional wooden floorboards.

The martas Hotel Berlin Mitte is within comfortable walking distance of the Hackescher Markt cultural district, the UNESCO museum island, Alexanderplatz, the historic Unter den Linden boulevard, the Brandenburg Gate and the Friedrichstraße shopping street.

The hotel offers excellent public transport connections to all parts of Berlin, thanks to the nearby S-Bahn (city rail) and U-Bahn (underground) stations.

Please note that the reception is only open from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM. If you expect to arrive outside of these opening hours, please inform the property in advance to arrange check-in. Cash payment is only possible during reception opening hours.

name: MEININGER Hotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Berlin, between Berlin Central Station and the Reichstag Parliament. The MEININGER offers soundproofed rooms with modern design and a flat-screen TV.

The nonsmoking rooms at MEININGER Hotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof all feature a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms.

Breakfast can be purchased each morning in the trendy M-Lounge.

Guests are welcome to use the MEININGER's shared kitchen, TV and stereo, or relax in the Game Zone area. A washing machine and tumble dryer are also available for a fee.

The MEININGER Berlin Hauptbahnhof offers panoramic views of the Government District and the Tiergarten Park. The Brandenburg Gate and Unter den Linden boulevard are a 10-minute walk away, and excellent public transport connections are available from Berlin Central Station.

name: easyHotel Berlin Hackescher Markt
description:
This budget hotel with a 24-hour reception is located in the vibrant Hackescher Markt district in central Berlin. All rooms include an private bathroom.

The easyHotel Berlin Hackescher Markt is functionally furnished with minimalist design. WiFi and 50 satellite TV channels are provided free of charge.

easyHotel Berlin is 328 feet from Rosenthaler Platz Underground Station. Alexanderplatz is 2 underground stops away and offers direct connections to Tegel Airport and Schönefeld Airport.

There are many shopping boutiques, galleries cafés, bars and restaurants near easyHotel Berlin Hackescher Markt. The UNESCO Museum Island is a 10-minute walk away.

Hackescher Markt is a 10-minute tram ride from the trendy Prenzlauer Berg district or the Friedrichstraße shopping street.

name: Pension I
description:
Pension I is located in Berlin. Free WiFi access is available.

Rooms here will provide you with a tv and a seating area. Complete with an electric kettle, the kitchenette also has a coffee machine. Shared bathrooms also come with towels. Extras include linen.

The guest house is 2.3 mi from Alexanderplatz, 2.9 mi from Kurfürstendamm and 1.3 mi from Potsdamer Platz. Tegel Airport is 5.6 mi away.

name: Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Berlin Potsdamer Platz
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Berlin Potsdamer Platz in Berlin offers family rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and balconies. Each room includes a walk-in shower, TV, and soundproofing.

Modern Facilities: Guests enjoy a fitness center, terrace, and free WiFi. Additional amenities include a elevator, 24-hour front desk, electric vehicle charging station, and paid on-site private parking.

Dining Options: A continental buffet breakfast with vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options is available. Breakfast includes warm dishes, fresh pastries, pancakes, cheese, fruits, and juice.

Prime Location: Located 13 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the hotel is a 16-minute walk from Potsdamer Platz. Nearby attractions include Topography of Terror (0.9 mi) and Holocaust Memorial (1.2 mi). Boating is available in the surroundings.

name: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre Ku'damm by IHG
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Center Ku'damm by IHG in Berlin offers family rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities. Each room includes a work desk, free toiletries, and a TV.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can enjoy a sauna, fitness center, indoor swimming pool, terrace, and free WiFi. Additional facilities include a restaurant, bar, and fitness room.

Dining Experience: The modern restaurant serves Mediterranean, Asian, and international cuisines with vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and dairy-free options. A buffet breakfast is available.

Prime Location: Located 14 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the hotel is a 7-minute walk from Zoologischer Garten underground station and 0.9 mi from Kurfürstendamm. Nearby attractions include Berliner Philharmonie and Brandenburg Gate.

name: Apartments am Brandenburger Tor
description:
Offering a fully equipped kitchen, a stereo system, and great transport connections, these stylish apartments in Berlin are centrally located between the Brandenburg Gate and Potsdamer Platz Square. Free Wi-Fi is included in every room.

Apartments am Brandenburger Tor provides quiet, contemporary-style apartments of all sizes. They all feature cable TV and bright décor. Some are on 2 levels.

The Brandenburger Tor Apartments are in the popular Mitte district of Berlin. The Unter den Linden Boulevard and the large Tiergarten Park are a 5-minute walk from all apartments. A playground is also nearby. Nearby there are also many cafés, bakeries and places to have breakfast.

Brandenburger Tor City Rail/Undeground Station and several bus stops are within a 5-minute walk of all the apartments. Towels and linen are included in the room rate.

name: Hotel AMANO Grand Central
description:
Central Location: Hotel AMANO Grand Central in Berlin offers a central setting with Berlin Central Station a 5-minute walk away. Nearby attractions include the Natural History Museum (2625 feet) and Brandenburg Gate (1.2 mi). Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 18 mi from the property.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms with walk-in showers, and free WiFi. Additional amenities include soundproofing, parquet floors, and work desks. Family rooms and hypoallergenic options cater to all guests.

Dining and Leisure: The family-friendly restaurant serves Italian cuisine in a modern and romantic ambiance. Guests can also enjoy a bar, coffee shop, and outdoor seating area. Activities include cycling, with bicycle parking and bike hire available.

Guest Services: The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, concierge service, and tour desk. Additional services include express check-in and check-out, luggage storage, and paid on-site parking.

name: Motel One Berlin-Tiergarten
description:
This designer hotel in Berlin's Tiergarten district is a 5 minute walk from the KaDeWe department store. Motel One Tiergarten offers free Wi-Fi and stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV and a mobile desk.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Motel One Berlin-Tiergarten feature distinctive light-blue decor and hardwood floors. All rooms have a modern bathroom with granite and a mosaic design.

The Motel One Berlin-Tiergarten's elegant One Lounge includes designer furniture. Snacks and drinks are served here 24 hours a day.

Wittenbergplatz Underground (subway) station is a 5 minute walk from the Motel One. Bus 100 also stops nearby, offering direct services to the Reichstag parliament and Alexanderplatz square.
address: An der Urania 12/14, Tempelhof-Schöneberg, 10787 Berlin, Germany

name: a&o Berlin Mitte
description:
This hostel in central Berlin is a 10-minute walk from the famous East Side Gallery. It offers a variety of accommodations and a shared lounge.

The a&o Berlin Mitte has a table tennis and air-hockey table and provides brightly decorated hotel and hostel rooms on different floors. WiFi is available in all rooms and public areas free of charge.

A varied breakfast buffet is provided every morning at the a&o, and guests can relax in the bar in the evenings. Restaurants and cafés can be found within walking distance. Guests can enjoy satellite TV broadcasting various sport channels in the lobby and bar.

In October 2018 the property has been completely refurbished.

Heinrich-Heine underground station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: relexa hotel Stuttgarter Hof
description:
The relexa hotel Stuttgarter Hof in Berlin is 656 feet from Anhalter Bahnhof S-Bahn Train Station. Potsdamer Platz Square is 2625 feet away.

The hotel has elegant rooms with a flat-screen TV, desk, and tea/coffee maker. Wi-Fi is available here.

Guests can keep fit in the gym.

Dogs are offered a blanket, feeding bowl and a small surprise free of charge.

S-Bahn trains run from Anhalter Bahnhof Station to the Brandenburg Gate in just 4 minutes. Underground parking is available at the relexa Stuttgarter Hof.

name: Hotel Ludwig van Beethoven
description:
This 3-star hotel is 656 feet from Hermannplatz Square, between Berlin’s lively Kreuzberg and Neukölln districts. Hotel Ludwig van Beethoven offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and excellent public transport links.

The spacious and quiet rooms at the Hotel Beethoven all include satellite TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served from 07:00 to 10:00 each morning in the Beethoven’s bright breakfast room. The roof terrace is open from 07:00 until 22:00 in fine weather.

There is a direct bus from Berlin (BER) Airport to Hermannplatz. Alexanderplatz Square is 15 minutes away from the hotel by underground train.

The Ludwig van Beethoven Berlin is directly opposite Hasenheide Park.

A limited number of free parking spaces are available. Reserving a parking space is not possible!

name: IntercityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof
description:
Prime Location: IntercityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof is located in Berlin city center, a 4-minute walk from Berlin Central Station. Nearby attractions include the Natural History Museum (0.7 mi) and Brandenburg Gate (18-minute walk). Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 18 mi away.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and city views. Additional amenities include soundproofing, work desks, and free WiFi. Guests appreciate the quietness of the area and the comfortable rooms.

Dining and Leisure: The hotel offers a bar, coffee shop, and child-friendly buffet. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests can also enjoy bike hire, tour desk, and luggage storage.

Nearby Activities: Surrounding activities include an ice-skating rink and boating. Berlin Central Station provides easy access to various attractions.

name: a&o Berlin Hauptbahnhof
description:
Just a 10-minute walk from Berlin Central Station, this hostel offers modern rooms, a 24-hour reception, and daily buffet breakfasts. On-site parking is available.

Located in a quiet side street, the family-friendly a&o Berlin Hauptbahnhof has brightly decorated rooms with a private bathroom. WiFi is free in all rooms as well as in the lobby.

Varied dinners are prepared at the a&o Berlin Hauptbahnhof on request. The a&o’s lobby bar invites guests to relax with a drink.

The games room at the a&o Berlin Hauptbahnhof includes a billiards table and table football. A souvenir shop, bicycle rental, and free luggage storage facilities are also available. Guests can enjoy satellite TV broadcasting various sport channels in the lobby and bar.

S-Bahn trains run from Berlin Central Station to Alexanderplatz Square in 5 minutes. The a&o Berlin Hauptbahnhof’s multilingual reception team can book sightseeing tours.

name: Hotel Augusta Am Kurfürstendamm
description:
Offering classical-style rooms, free WiFi, and varied breakfasts, this family-run, 3-star hotel in Berlin is just 164 feet from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Uhlandstraße Underground Station is 328 feet away.

Surrounded by the stylish boutiques of the Charlottenburg district, Hotel Augusta has colorful rooms and suites with satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a mini-bar. They have an private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The Augusta’s breakfast room features elegant chandeliers and natural wood furniture. Many cafés and restaurants are less than a 10-minute walk away.

The Augusta Berlin’s reception is open 24 hours a day. Concert tickets can be booked here.

The Messe Berlin exhibition grounds are a 20-minute bus journey from the Augusta Hotel. Trains run from Uhlandstraße Underground Station to Potsdamer Platz Square in 13 minutes.

name: ADAPT APARTMENTS BERLIN - Adlershof
description:
Offering free WiFi access and free private parking, ADAPT APARTMENTS BERLIN - Adlershof is located in suburban Berlin. It is 5 minutes’ walk to the Berlin-Adlershof Science and Technology Park.

In this self-catering accommodations, guests will find a seating area, a TV and a balcony. Each apartment’s private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Complete with a cooker, a fridge and a dishwasher, there is a full kitchen in all accommodations at ADAPT APARTMENTS BERLIN – Adlershof. Barbecue facilities are also available.

Guests wanting to visit the sights of Berlin can be at the Brandenburg Gate (9.3 mi) or the TV Tower (8.1 mi) in less than an hour using public transport. The extensive Tempelhofer Park area is a 10-minute drive away.

Berlin-Adlershof S-Bahn Train Station is 0.9 mi away. Schönefeld Airport is just 3.7 mi from ADAPT APARTMENTS BERLIN – Adlershof.

name: Holiday Inn - the niu, Hide Berlin Friedrichshain by IHG
description:
Located in Berlin, 2.7 mi from Alexanderplatz, the niu Hide features a bar. Located around 3.1 mi from Berlin TV Tower, the hotel with free WiFi is also 3.1 mi away from Museum Island.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms feature a private bathroom and a Teufel Boomster™ sound system.

This accommodations has a restaurant and a buffet breakfast is available each morning at the niu Hide. This accommodations also offers a 24-hour reception.

German Historical Museum is 3.1 mi from the accommodations. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Airport, 15 mi from the niu Hide.

name: Scandic Berlin Potsdamer Platz
description:
This modern Nordic Swan ecolabeled hotel is located beside the Potsdamer Platz entertainment district in the center of Berlin. The Scandic Hotel offers rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at the Scandic Hotel Potsdamer Platz feature a contemporary Scandinavian design. Every room has French windows, wooden floors, an armchair, air cooling systems and a stylish bathroom with bath or shower. Many rooms are also suitable for guests with limited mobility.

The Scandinavian-style restaurant serves a buffet breakfast with organic, gluten-free and lactose-free options. Child-friendly dining options are also available and there is a breakfast buffet specifically for children.

The hotel is certified with the "Bio-Siegel" in bronze.

The 8th-floor gym offers panoramic views over Potsdamer Platz, and the nearby Tiergarten Park is ideal for jogging. Bicycles and Nordic walking sticks can be borrowed at the reception.

The Scandic Berlin Potsdamer Platz offers on-site parking for a daily surcharge. Regular bus, S-Bahn and underground train services are available at Potsdamer Platz.

name: Motel One Berlin-Spittelmarkt
description:
Just 500 ft from Spittelmarkt Subway Station, this non-smoking, designer hotel in the Mitte district of Berlin features air-conditioned rooms, a 24-hour bar, underground parking and free Wi-Fi.

The rooms at the Motel One Berlin-Spittelmarkt all include a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms feature a rain shower and stylish mosaics.

Free Wi-Fi is provided in the Motel One Spittelmarkt’s 24-hour One Lounge. Varied breakfast buffets are also available here.

Gendarmenmarkt Square and the Friedrichstraße shopping street are an 8-minute walk from the Spittelmarkt Motel One.

Trains run from Spittelmarkt Underground Station to Alexanderplatz Square and Potsdamer Platz Square in just 5 minutes.

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre Alexanderplatz
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Berlin, just a 5-minute walk from Alexanderplatz Train Station. It offers a 24-hour reception as well as free WiFi and free use of the gym with weights and cardio equipment.

The Hampton By Hilton Berlin City Center Alexanderplatz features contemporary-style rooms with a top-quality own-brand bed and a 55-inch flat-screen TV. Each room also has a large desk, tea/coffee facilities and a private bathroom.

A hot breakfast is provided each morning at the Hampton By Hilton Berlin City Center. This consists of eggs, baked beans, waffles, fruit and many more options. Many cafés and restaurants can be found in the surrounding area.

The Hampton By Hilton Berlin City Center Alexanderplatz also has a business center. Guests enjoy free use of a computer with free WiFi and there is also a fax and photocopy service.

The nearby train station gives great access to public transport around Berlin by train, underground, bus and tram. Parking is available at the hotel for a daily surcharge.

name: Art Apartments
description:
Central Berlin Location: Art Apartments in Berlin offers a central location with a 5-minute walk to the Natural History Museum and less than 0.6 mi to the Memorial of the Berlin Wall. Berlin Central Station is a 16-minute walk away, while the Reichstag lies 1.2 mi from the hotel.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms with walk-in showers, tea and coffee makers, hairdryers, refrigerators, free toiletries, TVs, electric kettles, and wardrobes. Additional amenities include terraces, balconies with garden or city views, sofa beds, and parquet floors.

Convenient Facilities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, a elevator, and family rooms. Paid on-site private parking is available. Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 19 mi from the hotel. An ice-skating rink is in the surroundings.

Highly Rated by Guests: Art Apartments is highly rated for its convenient location, excellent public transport options, and central setting.
address: Chausseestraße 27 Neubau Hofseitig, Mitte, 10115 Berlin, Germany

name: InterContinental Berlin by IHG
description:
Prime City Location: InterContinental Berlin by IHG is located in Berlin city center, offering easy access to key attractions such as Zoologischer Garten underground station (less than 0.6 mi), Kurfürstendamm (1.1 mi), and Berliner Philharmonie (1.2 mi). Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 15 mi away.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests enjoy a fitness center, sun terrace, restaurant, bar, and free WiFi. Additional amenities include a private check-in and check-out service, 24-hour front desk, concierge, and child-friendly buffet.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, city views, and modern amenities. Family rooms and executive lounge access cater to all travelers.

Dining Experience: The modern and romantic restaurant serves German, local, and international cuisines with vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options. Breakfast includes continental, American, and full English/Irish.

name: Emma by Schulz Hotel Berlin Friedrichshain
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Emma by Schulz Hotel Berlin Friedrichshain in Berlin offers family rooms with private bathrooms, air-conditioning, and free WiFi. Each room includes a tea and coffee maker, electric kettle, and streaming services.

Dining and Leisure: Guests can enjoy a sun terrace, garden, restaurant, and bar. The hotel provides a child-friendly buffet, indoor play area, and games room. Additional amenities include a lounge, coffee shop, and outdoor seating area.

Prime Location: Located in the city center, the hotel is less than 0.6 mi from the East Side Gallery and 15 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport. Nearby attractions include Alexanderplatz and Berlin Cathedral. Public transport options enhance convenience.

name: Vienna House by Wyndham Andel's Berlin
description:
Offering a bar with panoramic views of Berlin, a Michelin-star awarded restaurant, a spa with 24-hour gym, and stylish rooms, this 4-star-superior hotel is just 6 tram stops from Alexanderplatz Square.

Located opposite the Landsberger Allee tram stop, the environmentally-friendly Vienna House by Wyndham Andel's Berlin has air-conditioned, nonsmoking rooms with a flat-screen TV, laptop safe, and large bathroom. Free WiFi is available here.

The SpaSphere is the 1804 ft² spa area consisting of a Finnish sauna, a bio sauna, a hot tub, fitness studio and relaxation terraces. Guests can enjoy natural plants and attentive spa treatments in a soundproofed area free of traffic noise.

In the evenings, The star restaurant Skykitchen takes you into a magical world of flavors of French, Asian and regional cuisine. Enjoy your culinary journey of the extra class with an excellent wine accompaniment, and the multiple award-winning service above the rooftops of Berlin.

Landsberger Allee City Rail Station is 164 feet from the Vienna House by Wyndham Andel's Berlin. Trains run to Schönefeld Airport in 30 minutes.

name: Holiday Inn Berlin City Center East Prenzlauer Berg by IHG
description:
A direct tram ride from Alexanderplatz, this hotel offers free WiFi in all areas, a 24-hour bar, a spacious gym, and soundproofed rooms with hot drinks facilities. It lies in the lively Prenzlauer Berg district of Berlin.

Air-conditioned rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows are provided by Holiday Inn Berlin City Center East Prenzlauer Berg. In-room comforts include free WiFi, telephone with voice mail and a TV with Sky satellite channels.

A large breakfast buffet is prepared each morning, and is available until 11:00 on Saturdays and Sundays. The lounge serves light, international food and Berlin specialties. Cocktails and hot drinks are offered in the One Sixty Nine bar.

Guests enjoy free use of the business center with printer access.

The Erich-Weinert-Straße tram stop is just outside the front door.  Prenzlauer Allee S-Bahn Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. Public transport tickets are available at reception and chargeable, limited garage parking system is available on-site.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz
description:
This 4-star-superior hotel offers 3 restaurants, a spa and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. It is Berlin's tallest hotel and is located directly on Alexanderplatz Square.

All rooms and suites at the Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz have marble bathrooms with power showers and heated floors. Free WiFi is provided throughout the hotel.

Meals and drinks are available in the Spagos Bar&Lounge, prepared before your eyes in the open kitchen.

The Park Inn’s wellness center includes a sauna, gym and massages. Guests can also relax on the top-floor terrace, which offers great views of central Berlin.

The Park Inn by Radisson stands opposite Alexanderplatz Station, which offers bus, tram, underground and S-Bahn rail links to all parts of Berlin. Museum Island and the lively Hackescher Markt area are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Wilde Aparthotels Berlin, Checkpoint Charlie
description:
Located in Berlin and within 656 feet of Checkpoint Charlie, Wilde Aparthotels Berlin, Checkpoint Charlie features a garden. This property currently has the Front Desk  open between 7am and 10.00pm and a concierge service. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge and free WiFi is available throughout the property

The aparthotel is inspired by Oscar Wilde, and has design features such as natural timber flooring, bespoke joinery, crafts, artwork and soft furnishings. Each apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, dining area and a bathroom with rain shower. Modern technology, as well as free  filtered water ,  Coffee Pods, teabags and  fresh milk  are standard in all units.

Every rooms offers hair dryers, Iron and Ironing board and Umbrellas for our guests.

Popular points of interest near Wilde Aparthotels Berlin, Checkpoint Charlie include Topography of Terror, Potsdamer Platz and Gendarmenmarkt. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Airport Willy Brandt, 16 mi from the accommodations.

name: H4 Hotel Berlin Alexanderplatz
description:
Just a 2-minute walk from Alexanderplatz, this hotel offers a rich breakfast buffet and modern, soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV. It has great transport links to all parts of Berlin.

The H4 Hotel Berlin Alexanderplatz has air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet. All rooms come with free Sky satellite channels, and free WiFi is provided in all areas of the hotel. Some rooms include a separate living room and electric kettle.

International food is served in the H4 Hotel Berlin Alexanderplatz’s Gaumenfreund restaurant. There is a bar and smoker’s lounge, as well as business facilities.

Mollstraße/Prenzlauer Allee Tram Stop is a 2-minute walk away. Alexanderplatz offers train, underground and bus links to Berlin’s major attractions and airports. Here, visitors find the Galeria Kaufhof and Alexa shopping malls.

Guests can relax in the gym or sauna after a busy day.

name: H24 Berlin Lichtenberg
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: H24 Berlin Lichtenberg in Berlin offers family rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and free WiFi. Each room includes a work desk, soundproofing, and a TV.

Dining and Leisure: Guests can enjoy a modern restaurant serving dinner, a terrace, and a bar. The hotel provides a lounge, outdoor seating area, and a minimarket.

Convenient Location: Located 16 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the hotel is near attractions such as the East Side Gallery (3.1 mi) and Alexanderplatz (3.7 mi).

Guest Satisfaction: Highly rated for its attentive staff, comfortable rooms, and delicious breakfast.

name: nhow Berlin
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: nhow Berlin in Berlin offers modern rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and free WiFi. Each room includes a work desk, TV, and soundproofing for a pleasant stay.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can enjoy spa facilities, a sauna, fitness center, sun terrace, and free bicycles. Additional amenities include a restaurant, bar, and private check-in and check-out services.

Prime Location: Located 14 mi from Berlin Brandenburg Airport, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from the East Side Gallery. Nearby attractions include Alexanderplatz and Berlin Cathedral, each within 3.1 mi.

Dining Experience: The modern restaurant serves continental, American, buffet, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free breakfasts with local specialties, fresh pastries, and more. Live music and evening entertainment enhance the dining experience.

name: Maritim proArte Hotel Berlin
description:
This hotel in central Berlin offers elegant rooms and a spa area with an indoor pool. It is located on Friedrichstrasse shopping street, 984 feet from the underground station.

The spacious, air-conditioned rooms and suites of the Maritim proArte Hotel Berlin feature Italian-style furnishings, satellite TV and a laptop safe. WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in the whole hotel.

International cuisine as well as characteristic Berlin food is served in the hotel’s 2 restaurants in a cozy atmosphere. The Checkpoint bar offers an exquisite choice of cocktails, long drinks, high quality spirits as well as burgers, snacks and nibbles.

The Maritim’s spa area includes a swimming pool, sauna, steam room and fitness room. Massages and beauty treatments are also available.

The famous Unter den Linden Boulevard featuring the Brandenburg Gate is just 328 feet away. The UNESCO Museum Island is only 0.9 mi from the hotel. Other attractions within walking distance include the Friedrichstadt-Palast, Admiralspalast, Komische Oper, boat tours and Hackescher Markt.

name: Three Little Pigs Hostel - Your Berlin Castle
description:
Set within a former 19th-century convent, this hostel is a 10-minute walk from Checkpoint Charlie and the striking Potsdamer Platz square. Free Wi-Fi is offered.

Located within walking distance of the Holocaust Monument and Brandenburg Gate, the Three Little Pigs Hostel - Your Berlin Castle offers bright, nonsmoking rooms with shared or private bathroom facilities. All guests have a locker of their own, and padlocks can be purchased at reception for a small charge.

Wake up to an all-you-can-eat breakfast buffet (available for a surcharge), and round off your evening with a drink at the hostel bar.

You can also enjoy the hostel's tasty lunch packs and half-board service on request.

Thanks to the Three Little Pigs Hostel's proximity to the Anhalter Bahnhof S-Bahn (city rail) station and several bus routes, you can explore Berlin with ease.

The hostel reception is open 24 hours a day. Guests can also rent bicycles from the hostel for a fee.

The Three Little Pigs Hostel - Your Berlin Castle provides paid city tours and insider tips about the capital's exciting nightlife venues.

The hostel reception is open 24 hours a day. Guests can also rent bicycles from the hostel for a fee.

No problem if you forget your towel! You can purchase towels at reception for just €5.50.

The Three Little Pigs Hostel - Your Berlin Castle provides paid city tours and insider tips about the capital's exciting nightlife venues.

name: Holiday Inn Berlin City-West by IHG
description:
This hotel offers large and soundproofed rooms with flat-screen TV. It is a 5-minute walk from underground trains. It also provides excellent connections to the Messe Exhibition grounds.

The air-conditioned rooms at the 4-star Holiday Inn Berlin City-West are at least 82 ft² in size. They include cable TV and a bathroom with hairdryer.

Breakfast, dinner and drinks are served in the PRIME Restaurant & Bar with summer terrace. Drinks are available all day in the PRIME Restaurant & Bar.

Rohrdamm Underground Station provides access to the city center.

The Holiday Inn is located in the Siemensstadt area of Berlin-Spandau, within walking distance of international companies such as Siemens.

name: Grimm's Potsdamer Platz
description:
Offering fitness facilities, Grimm´s Hotel am Potsdamer Platz is centrally located in Berlin. It is less than 10 minutes' walk from the popular shopping and business district surrounding Potsdamer Platz Square.

Featuring elegant modern furnishings throughout, all rooms comes with a TV and a private bathroom fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Most rooms offer attractive city views. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

Breakfast is served each morning at Grimm's Hotel am Potsdamer Platz. An in-house restaurant offers meals at other times of the day.

Many of Berlin's main sights, such as the Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie, are located less than 1.2 mi from the property. There are also several large parks within walking distance of the property.


Parking spaces are available at a nearby public parking garage within short walking distance. For an additional fee, the hotel offers rental bikes and sauna facilities.
